content: click here for free pattern tutorial **corner flower granny square tutorial** 1 the corner flower granny square if you re a fan of granny square or a beginner searching for an easy pattern this tutorial is perfect for you join us as we guide you through the entire process of making this lovely corner flower granny square from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll soon have your own corner flower granny square to start a throw blanket or bag whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this project both enjoyable and rewarding in this tutorial video you ll learn - step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals - how different colors enhance your granny square materials 1 yarn - i used 6 colors to contrast the rounds you can use any number of colors from 3 to 6 although to see the flower more clearly i recommend using flower colors for rounds 1 and 2 and green leaf color for round 3 2 crochet hook 3 scissors 1 https //youtu be/zcy3tweeb2c
